summary: A portrait of a patron of the arts extraordinaire who transformed a modest fortune and impeccable taste into one of the premiere collections of twentieth century art.
cast: Peggy Guggenheim|Jacqueline Bograd Weld|Francine Prose|John Richardson|Nicky Haslam|Edmund White|Calvin Tompkins|Carlo McCormick|Mercedes Ruehl|Diego Cortez|Donald Kuspit|Philip Rylands|Karole Vail|Stephanie Barron|Lindsay Pollock|Lisa Phillips|Hans Ulrich Obrist|Jeffrey Deitch|Susan Davidson|Dore Ashton|Michael Govan|Larry Gagosian|Robert De Niro|Jane Rylands|Marina Abramovic|Arne Glimcher|Pepe Karmel|Dominique LÃ©vy|Alexander S.C. Rower|Simon de Pury|Polly Devlin
title: Peggy Guggenheim: Adicta al arte
